data.title: Charlton Heston (Actor)
data.meta_description: As a Hollywood star he appeared in 100 films over the course of 60 years. He is best known for his roles in "The Ten Commandments" (1956);...
data.text:
Full Name: John Charles Carter

Profession: Actor

Biography: As a Hollywood star he appeared in 100 films over the course of 60 years. He is best known for his roles in "The Ten Commandments" (1956); "Ben-Hur", for which he won the Academy Award for Best Actor (1959), "El Cid" (1961), and "Planet of the Apes" (1968).

The starring roles gave the actor a grave, authoritative persona and embodied responsibility, individualism and masculinity; he rejected scripts that did not emphasize those virtues.

Born: October 4, 1923

Birthplace: Wilmette, Illinois, USA

Generation: Greatest Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Pig

Star Sign: Libra
